nodes.text: Saki Prime was a red giant located in the Bootana Hutta region of Hutt Space. It was orbited by the planet Sakiya.
Saki Prime was a dying star which emitted intense radiations. Despite these intense radiations, the lush jungle planet of Sakiya thrived beneath a dense protective ionosphere.
Saki Prime's spectrum shifted more toward the red. From the surface of Sakiya, the red giant looked like a swollen crimson jewel hanging in the azure sky.
